required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Atrial and Ventricular Wall Stress During Breathing
clinical_study.official_title: Atrial and Ventricular Wall Stress, Effects of Breathing and Airway Pressure

brief_summary.textblock: Healthy reclining adult volunteers, with Valsalva manoeuver, Muller manoeuver, light continuous positive airway pressure by mask, passive leg raising, and maximal hand-grip. Ultrasound heart images captured before and during.

detailed_description.textblock: With focus on atrial wall strain and strain-rate, In healthy volunteer adult subjects, heart ultrasound is recorded during resting, Valsalva manoeuver, Muller manoeuver, passive leg raising, and handgrip. Echocardiographic recordings are made before and during each intervention. Participants are otherwise resting in a reclined position.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Healthy reclining adult volunteers, with Valsalva manoeuver, Muller manoeuver, light continuous positive airway pressure by mask, passive leg raising, and maximal hand-grip. Ultrasound heart images captured before and during.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in atrial wall stress during breathing manoeuver, compared to control measurement immediately before the breathing manoeuver
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 seconds, i.e. control measurement and then measurement during breathing manoeuver observed from same breathing/measurement sequence
primary_outcome.description: Echocardiographic measure, comparing control measurement to measurement during breathing manoeuver

arm_group.description: All subjects perform/undergo Valsalva, Muller, CPAP, hand grip, and passive leg raise, with ultrasound examination of heart recorded before and during the manoeuvre.

intervention.intervention_name: Simple breathing manuevers during brief echocardiographic imaging
intervention.description: Valsalva, Muller, light mask CPAP, leg raising, hand grip.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy adults
Exclusion Criteria:
- known heart or lung disease

facility.name: Umeå University, and the University Hospital of Umeå
